title: Chilled summer courgette soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 white onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '400g courgette, sliced', '400ml vegetable stock', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh chervil', '280ml double cream']
